description: Our Deluxe Suite offers a luxurious experience with a comfortable king-sized bed, a private bathroom with all necessary amenities, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The room has a beautiful view of the city and includes free Wi-Fi and room service.

Our Premium Room offers a cozy and elegant space with a comfortable queen-sized bed, a private bathroom with all necessary amenities, and a fully-equipped kitchenette. The room has a beautiful view of the garden and includes free Wi-Fi and daily housekeeping.

Our Standard Double Room offers a simple and comfortable space with two twin beds, a private bathroom with all necessary amenities, and a small kitchenette. The room includes free Wi-Fi and daily housekeeping.

Our Luxury Suite offers a spacious and stylish experience with two comfortable queen-sized beds, two private bathrooms with all necessary amenities, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The suite has a beautiful view of the ocean and includes free Wi-Fi and daily housekeeping.

Our Family Room offers a spacious and comfortable space with three cozy beds, two private bathrooms with all necessary amenities, and a small kitchenette. The room includes free Wi-Fi and daily housekeeping.
Our Budget Room offers a simple and affordable space with a comfortable twin bed, a shared bathroom, and access to a communal kitchenette. The room includes free Wi-Fi and daily housekeeping.
